Step Process Component Learn More

API Details

Settings

object

  • options Array<object>?

    • options.linearProgression boolean Whether to prevent clicking and allow only prev/next navigation of steps (optional, default false)
    • options.folderIconOpen string A specific folder open icon (optional, default "caret-up")
    • options.folderIconClosed string A specific folder close icon (optional, default "caret-down")
    • options.stepList object The ID of the stepList (optional, default "#step-list")
    • options.stepLi object jQuery selector for the step elements (optional, default ".js-step")
    • options.stepLink object jQuery selector for the step link elements (optional, default ".js-step-link")
    • options.stepFolder object jQuery selector for the step folder elements (optional, default ".js-step-folder")
    • options.btnPrev object jQuery selector for the previous step button (optional, default ".js-step-link-prev")
    • options.btnNext object jQuery selector for the next step button (optional, default ".js-step-link-next")
    • options.beforeSelectStep (function (event, args) | Promise) A callback (function or promise) that gives
      args.stepLink (the step link element) and args.isStepping (whether we are prev/next'ing or not) (optional, default null)

Functions

goToNextStep

Go to the next step element

goToPreviousStep

Go to the previous step element

selectStep

Select a step

Parameters

  • stepLink object The jquery object for the step link element
  • linearDirection string Which direction we are traveling (optional, default none|previous|next)
